summary: Diff adds a generated asset registry and canvas asset loader, upgrades canvas rendering (retina scaling, parallax/vignette, enhanced particles, sprite-based token/hazard rendering), and applies more “premium” UI styling plus usage of generated logo/background on Landing and Results. However, the diff does not show the required raster assets being added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and the renderer does not load/render a player sprite from generated assets. Diff also introduces additional generated assets and copy changes not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: New high-fidelity raster assets exist under frontend/public/assets/generated using the filenames specified in this build request (logo, menu background, ingame background, token icon, toad hazard icon).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows TypeScript/CSS/HTML changes referencing these files, but no evidence of the actual raster files being added/replaced under frontend/public/assets/generated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Canvas scene should use detailed sprite rendering for the player (not just tokens/hazards) when new assets are available, avoiding simple fallback circles/glows.
missing_requirements.reason: The renderer asset loader only loads background, token, hazard, and a UI sheet—no player sprite asset is defined/loaded, so player-specific sprite rendering from generated assets is not implemented in the shown changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced an additional generated asset (ui-icons-sheet.dim_1024x1024.png) and a sprite-sheet icon component, beyond the explicitly requested filenames.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies upgrading five named files; the diff adds a new ui icon sheet and code to consume it, which is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed perk names/descriptions to new meme/crypto-themed copy (user-facing text changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest REQ-16 requires keeping all existing UI flows and English user-facing text intact; the diff summary indicates perk text was changed (even if still English).
